title: Gold Cog/wrentch type Icon? How did I get this?
body: Just curious if someone could tell me what this icon is for? I got it today along with the poro icon. Is it based off of an event?

replies.body: The icon looks to be for Piltover, which was redeemed through the [Universe ](http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/region/piltover)site.  You actually got the icon back in December, but are likely seeing the notification on the updated client because toasts were just enabled.  Per the current [ticker](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002024567--Jan-26-Click-here-if-you-are-getting-notifications-about-receiving-gifts-in-the-updated-client-), you may see a backlog of notifications of old content you already received.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Oh thank you that explains a lot.
